snippet: California agriculture officials reported good news for wine lovers and vineyard operators: a record harvest of wine grapes.
abstract: California agriculture officials report record harvest of wine grapes, due to expanded acreage and favorable weather.
lead_paragraph: California agriculture officials reported good news for wine lovers and vineyard operators: a record harvest of wine grapes.

headline.main: California Vineyards Bring in Record Crop
headline.print_headline: California Vineyards Bring in Record Crop
